Sentencas: Combustion synthesis provides an attractive method of producing ceramic powders because of its low cost, process simplicity and fastness.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: Materials based on La2NiO4+delta can be successfully prepared by combustion synthesis.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: La2-xSrxNiO4+delta (x = 0, 0.1) accommodates oxygen excess by oxygen interstitials rather than by the more usual cation vacancies, A high concentration of oxygen interstitials offers the possibility of rapid oxygen transport through the ceramic material and thus provide a new type of mixed ionic-electronic conductor.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: The fast oxide ion diffusion combined with its thermal stability indicate that these materials would be good candidates for use in Ceramic Oxygen Generators (COGs) and Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: The present work discusses a combustion synthesis technique to prepare La2-xSrxNiO4+delta (x = 0, 0.1) powders using the corresponding metal nitrates-urea mixtures, at low temperature and short reaction times.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: The as-prepared combustion powders were characterized by XRD, DTA-TG, SEM/TEM-EDX and BET.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: La2-xSrxNiO4 (x = 0, 0.1) powders with a good compositional control and homogeneity are attained.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: The as-prepared powders obtained at 300 degreesC (ignition temperature)
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis

Sentencas: showed much higher specific surface area than powders obtained via alternative routes and contained La2-xSrxNiO4+delta, as the major phase present, together with La2O3 and a small amount of NiO. La2-xSrxNiO4+delta single phase is achieved, respectively at 950 degreesC for x = 0.1 and at 975 degreesC for x = 0.
Titulo: La2-xSrxNiO4+δ ceramic powders prepared by combustion synthesis
